forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 1 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 78, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 1 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun begins to dip, Downtown San Francisco basks in the soft glow of a mostly clear evening, with the air cooling gracefully to a comfortable 59 degrees. The west-southwest wind whispers lightly, adding a subtle touch of movement to the serene atmosphere. Above, the sky is a brilliant canvas, unmarred by fog or haze, allowing for a clear, sweeping view of the city and bay.

Looking ahead to Tuesday, the promise of a sunny day lingers, with temperatures expected to rise near 78 degrees before settling into the afternoon comfortably around 72. The gentle winds will continue to encourage outdoor activities, presenting a perfect backdrop for strolling through the vibrant streets or enjoying time at the local cafes. Given the pleasant conditions, a light jacket may suffice for the cool evening, while comfortable attire will serve well through the warm day ahead. Whether taking a leisurely walk along the waterfront or simply enjoying a moment with friends, it’s a splendid time to appreciate the beauty of the city, as nature embraces urban life in effortless harmony.
